hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Environment as Leading Indicator for Altcoin Rotation
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum gas prices remain below the 30th percentile of their 30-day range for 3 consecutive days during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, high-beta Ethereum ecosystem tokens (GRT, CRV, BAT) will outperform ETH by 8-15% over the following 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas prices indicate reduced network congestion, creating favorable conditions for Ethereum-based applications and their tokens. This often precedes capital rotation from ETH to ecosystem projects as transaction costs become predictable.
entry_conditions: ETH gas price < 30th percentile of 30-day range for 3 consecutive days
ETH/BTC ratio stable or rising (no ETH-specific weakness)
Total crypto market cap above 30-day average
Select 2 of: GRT, CRV, BAT showing positive volume divergence

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10% average outperformance vs ETH across basket

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Altcoins fail to outperform despite favorable gas conditions, or ETH gas spikes abruptly during holding period.
